attributes.action: Fine Big companies/Business who delay payment to smaller companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small businesses rely on payment from larger firms, Firms that refuse to pay on time, should be fined, warned and blacklisted. Small businesses are having to get bank loans to survive, all because big companies refuse to pay they bills, if this can be proved, the big company should pay towards these extra costs.
